title: Gideon's Force
description: Commander George Gideon of Scotland Yard mystery.Wellesley Estate has become the focus of violence . muggings, rape, and arson . that the police cannot control; a restaurant ownerAs two brothers are killed gangland style; and a clairvoyant is insisting to the police that a man's kidnapped wife is alive . all they have to do is find the house in which she's being held.
author: J.J. Marric
